00:15 Businesses now taking zelle instead of venmo/paypal
01:00 Motives for this
02:05 IRS rule change
02:32 What Zelle is
03:17 This is a dumb way to avoid taxes
04:00 Unreported tax cost
04:50 My skepticism of estimates
05:55 There are OTHER reasons to not use paypal & venmo!
